General.Name: Thanulux Public Company Limited
General.Description: Thanulux Public Company Limited manufactures, subcontracting, and distributes apparel and leather products for men, women, and children in Thailand. It offers shirts, T-shirts, pants, suits, jackets, pajamas, towels, underwear, handkerchief, scarfs, swimming wear, sportswear, maternity clothes, neckties, jeans, and socks, as well as leather goods comprising wallets, handbags, and belts. The company also provides garments for infants; and diapers, bedding, shoes, socks, dolls, and accessories for toddlers. In addition, it manufactures healthcare and medical textile products comprising medical uniforms, surgical kits, patient uniforms, as well as medical devices, such as syringes, disinfectant wipes, etc.; and uniforms and workwear, Buddhist monk triple robes, and white robes for practice of dharma under the Thammarat and Thammasorn brands. The company supplies clothes to private organizations, financial institutions, petrochemical groups, educational institutions, automotive groups, healthcare organizations, and hospitals, as well as hotels and spas. Further, the company exports its products to various countries. Thanulux Public Company Limited was incorporated in 1975 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.
